means: 不恰当，离题，不相干的事物

PerfectNetExp.abs: irrelevancy 不相关性, irrelevancy 偏离度, irrelevancy 不相干

list.abs: 环境变量(environmental variable)无关变量(irrelevant variable)对变量进行分类(5)
irrelevancy =irrelevanceirrelevant information 不需要信息；干扰irreplaceable 不能替换的
irrelative 无关系的irrelevant cue 无关连线索irrelevant data 无关资料
irrelevant data 无关资料irrelevant dimension 无关连维度irrelevant drive 多余驱力

entry.tran: 枝节问题;无关紧要的事
entry.def: If you describe something as an irrelevancy, you have a low opinion of it because it is not important in a situation.

example.ex: Why was he wasting her time with these irrelevancies?
example.tran: 他为什么要在这些无关紧要的事上浪费她的时间呢？

means.word_mean: 1. the lack of a relation of something to the matter at hand

auth_sentence.content: I felt the paper might derail itself to the point of irrelevancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: I felt the paper might derail itself to the point of irrelevancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I felt the paper might derail itself to the point of irrelevancy.

auth_sentence.content: But she had a clarification of her own to make, one that threw his motives into irrelevancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: But she had a clarification of her own to make, one that threw his motives into irrelevancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But she had a clarification of her own to make, one that threw his motives into irrelevancy.
